ygData.subject: RE: Ok I need advice...
ygData.msgSnippet: ... On all big hunts I have been on there is a designated looter in each group, usually the group leader.  This person is responsible for looting the corpse if
ygData.messageBody:
>From: "Cranfill, Wendy" <Wendy_Cranfill@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: "'eqbards@onelist.com'" <eqbards@onelist.com>
>Subject: RE: [eqbards] Ok I need advice...
>
> So my question is this... what do I do? I know in the
>future I'm not looting a thing and that we should have had more clear rules
>set up. Does this happen on other servers? Has this happened to any of
>you?
>

On all big hunts I have been on there is a designated looter in each group,
usually the group leader. This person is responsible for looting the corpse
if the group gets the kill as soon as feasible. If the group leader dies
before the battle ends then someone in the group, usually at the direction
of the group leader, will loot and report.

One way to tell if a corpse has been ninja looted is if it gives no coin.
As, to the best of my knowledge, mobs will always drop some coin, except of
course newbie mobs.

Rokenn Swiftsong - Karana server

EQ Bard Song Analysis
http://rgonzalez.net/EQSongs/
